event.description: Brett Gardner flies out to left fielder Mallex Smith.
Gary Sanchez grounds out sharply, pitcher Chris Archer to first baseman Logan Morrison.
Greg Bird walks.
Yankees challenged (play at 1st), call on the field was upheld: Matt Holliday grounds out softly, second baseman Brad Miller to first baseman Logan Morrison.
Jacoby Ellsbury flies out to left fielder Mallex Smith in foul territory.
Rays challenged (play at 1st), call on the field was upheld: Starlin Castro singles on a ground ball to second baseman Brad Miller.
Chase Headley singles on a ground ball to left fielder Mallex Smith. Starlin Castro to 2nd.
Aaron Judge doubles (1) on a line drive to left fielder Mallex Smith. Starlin Castro scores. Chase Headley to 3rd.
Ronald Torreyes grounds out, second baseman Brad Miller to first baseman Logan Morrison. Chase Headley scores. Aaron Judge to 3rd.
Brett Gardner grounds out, second baseman Brad Miller to first baseman Logan Morrison.
Gary Sanchez grounds out, shortstop Tim Beckham to first baseman Logan Morrison.
Greg Bird flies out to left fielder Mallex Smith in foul territory.
Matt Holliday strikes out swinging.
Jacoby Ellsbury strikes out swinging.
Starlin Castro singles on a sharp line drive to left fielder Mallex Smith.
Chase Headley strikes out on a foul tip.
Aaron Judge pops out to first baseman Logan Morrison in foul territory.
Ronald Torreyes called out on strikes.
Brett Gardner grounds out, second baseman Brad Miller to first baseman Logan Morrison.
Gary Sanchez flies out to left fielder Mallex Smith.
Greg Bird flies out to center fielder Kevin Kiermaier.
Matt Holliday grounds out, shortstop Tim Beckham to first baseman Logan Morrison.
Jacoby Ellsbury grounds out, first baseman Logan Morrison to pitcher Chris Archer.
Starlin Castro singles on a ground ball to center fielder Kevin Kiermaier.
Chase Headley singles on a bunt ground ball to third baseman Evan Longoria. Starlin Castro to 2nd.
Aaron Judge strikes out swinging.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Aaron Hicks replaces Ronald Torreyes.
Aaron Hicks flies out to right fielder Steven Souza Jr.
Brett Gardner singles on a line drive to left fielder Mallex Smith. Starlin Castro to 3rd. Chase Headley to 2nd.
Gary Sanchez grounds out, shortstop Tim Beckham to first baseman Logan Morrison.
Pitching Change: Danny Farquhar replaces Chris Archer.
Greg Bird strikes out swinging.
Matt Holliday strikes out swinging.
Jacoby Ellsbury hit by pitch.
Starlin Castro pops out to catcher Derek Norris in foul territory.
Pitching Change: Austin Pruitt replaces Danny Farquhar.
Chase Headley singles on a ground ball to left fielder Mallex Smith.
Aaron Judge reaches on a force attempt, fielding error by third baseman Evan Longoria. Chase Headley to 2nd.
Aaron Hicks singles on a line drive to shortstop Tim Beckham. Chase Headley to 3rd. Aaron Judge to 2nd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Chris Carter replaces Pete Kozma.
Pitching Change: Alex Colome replaces Austin Pruitt.
Chris Carter out on a sacrifice fly to left fielder Mallex Smith. Chase Headley scores.
Gary Sanchez strikes out swinging.
Greg Bird flies out to center fielder Kevin Kiermaier.
Corey Dickerson singles on a sharp line drive to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury.
Kevin Kiermaier doubles (1) on a sharp line drive to left fielder Brett Gardner. Corey Dickerson to 3rd.
Evan Longoria out on a sacrifice fly to right fielder Aaron Judge. Corey Dickerson scores.
Brad Miller singles on a ground ball to second baseman Starlin Castro, deflected by first baseman Greg Bird. Kevin Kiermaier to 3rd.
Steven Souza Jr. walks. Brad Miller to 2nd.
Logan Morrison singles on a sharp ground ball to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury. Kevin Kiermaier scores. Brad Miller scores. Steven Souza Jr. to 2nd.
Tim Beckham lines out to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury.
Mallex Smith strikes out swinging.
Derek Norris grounds out, third baseman Chase Headley to first baseman Greg Bird.
Corey Dickerson strikes out swinging.
Kevin Kiermaier walks.
Evan Longoria homers (1) on a line drive to left field. Kevin Kiermaier scores.
Brad Miller flies out to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury.
Steven Souza Jr. called out on strikes.
Logan Morrison homers (1) on a fly ball to center field.
Tim Beckham doubles (1) on a ground ball to left fielder Brett Gardner.
Mallex Smith singles on a bunt ground ball to catcher Gary Sanchez. Tim Beckham scores. Mallex Smith to 2nd. Throwing error by catcher Gary Sanchez.
Derek Norris flies out to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury. Mallex Smith to 3rd.
Pitching Change: Tommy Layne replaces Masahiro Tanaka.
Corey Dickerson lines out to second baseman Starlin Castro.
Kevin Kiermaier singles on a sharp ground ball to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury.
Evan Longoria called out on strikes.
Brad Miller strikes out swinging. Kevin Kiermaier steals (1) 2nd base.
Pitching Change: Adam Warren replaces Tommy Layne.
Steven Souza Jr. flies out softly to left fielder Brett Gardner.
Logan Morrison grounds out, first baseman Greg Bird to pitcher Adam Warren.
Tim Beckham called out on strikes.
Mallex Smith grounds out sharply to first baseman Greg Bird.
Derek Norris flies out to right fielder Aaron Judge.
Corey Dickerson strikes out swinging.
Kevin Kiermaier grounds out, shortstop Ronald Torreyes to first baseman Greg Bird.
Defensive Substitution: Pete Kozma replaces left fielder Brett Gardner, batting 1st, playing shortstop.
Aaron Hicks remains in the game as the left fielder.
Pitching Change: Jonathan Holder replaces Adam Warren.
Evan Longoria strikes out swinging.
Brad Miller singles on a ground ball to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury.
Steven Souza Jr. grounds into a force out, shortstop Pete Kozma to second baseman Starlin Castro. Brad Miller out at 2nd. Steven Souza Jr. to 1st.

Tim Beckham strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Chasen Shreve replaces Jonathan Holder.
Mallex Smith flies out to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury.
